item.title: Big up! My book is FREE now !!
item.description: To celebrate the Groundbreaker Award and Oracle Code New York, my book “Playing with Java Microservices on Kubernetes and OpenShift” will be FREE forever ! This is a gift is for the community that voted for me and helped me to achieve this great award ! ðŸ¤© The book is available on the Leanpub website: Thank you so much for voting for me !! ðŸ¥³
